summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight fluctuations in temperature and TDS.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Consider partial water changes if TDS continues to rise above 400 ppm.
Monitor temperature closely; ensure it stays within 22-28°C for tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.008 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 329.867 / 307.8 / 338.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.26 / 21.5 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
